paper_title: Temperature-dependent discovery of BCC refractory multi-principal element alloys: Integrating deep learning and CALPHAD calculations

claims.claim: On the test dataset, the trained MLP achieves an R2 score of 0.96 for predicting the BCC phase.
instruction: The code loads the trained checkpoint, evaluates the model on the test dataset, and prints the R2 values for all phases
The expected R2 for the BCC phase is given by the second printed value, approximately 0.96
